src:
Kapitalismen i sin nuvarande form fungerar inte
DEBATT. Sedan mitten av 1970-talet har medelklassens inkomster stagnerat i västvärlden medan arbetarklassens pressas nedåt. Vi kan lätt konstatera att kommunismen inte fungerade, men det gör inte heller kapitalismen i dess nuvarande form, i alla fall inte för alla, skriver Robert Weil, finansman och grundare av Proventus.
06 Nov 2019, 19:30 by Debattredaktionen

text:
Capitalism in its present form does not work
DEBATE. Since the mid-1970s, middle-class incomes have stagnated in the western world while working-class incomes have been pushed down. We can easily say that communism did not work, but neither does capitalism in its present form, at least not for everyone, writes Robert Weil, financier and founder of Proventus.
06 Nov 2019, 19:30 by Debate editor
